Text: Re Enron de Inversiones de Energia SCA an Argentine company EDIDE Cc had the resolutions Where are we on this issue RFR To Rafael nron Sara CT cc Samantha nron Subject Enron de Inversiones de Energia SCA an Argentine company EDIDE Rafael Any update on this Sheila Forwarded by Sheila GloverHOUECT on AM From Sheila Glover AM To Rafael nron cc Sara CT Susan CT Subject Enron de Inversiones de Energia SCA an Argentine company EDIDE Rafael I send the request dated to Morgan Stanley to Contribute the shares from EPCA to EDIDE and then Convert EDIDEs shares to ordinary WHEN the account for EDIDE is open Kelly has forwarded a copy to you My understanding from Susan is that they are awaiting registration materials from you Please let me know when Legal can expect to receive these Thanks Sheila Forwarded by Sheila GloverHOUECT on AM From Sheila Glover AM To Sara CT Ted CT Donna CT Theresa T CT Aneela CT Susan CT cc Subject Enron de Inversiones de Energia SCA an Argentine company EDIDE Forwarded by Sheila GloverHOUECT on AM Rafael NRONDEVELOPMENT AM To Sheila NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Danthea DumayasENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Veronica PerezENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Subject Re Contacts Corrections to below Originally had EPCA should be EDIDE RFR Rafael Rangel AM To Sheila NRONDEVELOPMENT Don NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Danthea DumayasENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Veronica Perez Subject Re Contacts Sheila as discussed yesterday I need to do the following Open a brokerage account at Morgan Stanley for Enron de Inversiones de Energia SCA an Argentine company EDIDE This account will hold ADRs that will be contributed or transferred into its account by Enron Pipeline CompanyArgentina SA EPCAaccount at Morgan Stanley EPCA will contribute ADRs in Transportadora Gas del Sur TGS into EDIDEs new account That contribution represents the capital contribution that EPCA is obligated to make under the capital increase resolution dated February th After the ADRs are transferred into EDIDEs accounts EDIDE will need to convert such ADRs into ordinary Class B shares in TGS so that they can be registered accordingly in Argentina Sheila I am forwarding a hard copy of this email with appropriate support corporate resolutions authorizing me to open this account resolution authorizing the increase in capital and some forms that I had Eduardo OjeaQuintana President of EDIDE sign Please review and advise of what else you need to finalize this transaction Best Regards RFR Forwarded by Rafael RangelENRONDEVELOPMENT on AM Rafael Rangel PM To Sheila NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Danthea DumayasENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Subject Re Contacts Sheila finally ready to open up the account at Morgan Stanley for EDIDE so that EPCA can transfer the correct amount of ADRs I have the Corporate Resolution from EDIDE I understand that the contact at Morgan Stanley has changed Please advise RFR To Danthea DumayasENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Rafael RangelENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Subject Contacts I will be out on maternity leave soon hopefully In my absence please call Sheila Glover for any questions that you may have If you just need a copy of an old report please call Aneela Charania at Thanks Terri

Re Opening of Brokerage Account at Morgan Stanley for Enron de Inversiones de Energia SCA Cc for the note Nancy what is status Thanks RFR Susan CT PM To Rafael NRON Nancy nron cc Sara CT Sheila CT Samantha nron Subject Opening of Brokerage Account at Morgan Stanley for Enron de Inversiones de Energia SCA Please be advised that at the close of business on Friday July I will be taking a personal leave of absence from Enron When you receive the executed corporate resolutions and authorized traders list required to open the referenced brokerage account please forward the documents to Samantha Boyd EBA Phone Samantha will assist you to open the brokerage account Susan D Flynn Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB Houston Texas Phone Fax

Re Opening of Brokerage Account at Morgan Stanley for Enron de Inversiones de Energia SCA Cc for the note Nancy what is status Thanks RFR Susan CT PM To Rafael NRON Nancy nron cc Sara CT Sheila CT Samantha nron Subject Opening of Brokerage Account at Morgan Stanley for Enron de Inversiones de Energia SCA Please be advised that at the close of business on Friday July I will be taking a personal leave of absence from Enron When you receive the executed corporate resolutions and authorized traders list required to open the referenced brokerage account please forward the documents to Samantha Boyd EBA Phone Samantha will assist you to open the brokerage account Susan D Flynn Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB Houston Texas Phone Fax
